title: Betsy's Egg
summaries: Betsy's Egg is a Hardmode, post-Golem pet-summoning item that spawns Itsy Betsy to follow the player around. Betsy's Egg has a 1/4 (25%) of being dropped from Betsy in Master Mode.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons Itsy Betsy
'No fire sacrifices required!'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
